lines.text: Just to be sure- you didn't bring that, did you?
That giant pile of ashes. That's not, like, fingerprinting dust or something, is it?
Why would we even need that much fingerprinting dust?
In case the suspect is really, really grabby? I dunno, man.
You never just cover a whole crime scene in fingerprint dust to make sure you don't miss anything?
That's- that's not how dusting for prints works.
Yeah? You learn something new every day.
